comments:
1. import a log
2. create a time based correlation with the log
3. reimport the same log, when asked choose replace
4. open the correlation again, a NPE error message pops up
5. open the properties of the correlation, the same log shows up on both Available Logs list and Selected Logs list.

This is required from AC perspective.

Try to create a new log correlation after replacing the log. You will get 2 log instances displayed in the correlation dialog box.
I cannot reproduce this problem for XMI resources. For RDB resources the correlation cannot be loaded in the log interactions view sometimes after replacing the log files.
